alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Tammany; Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 2:01PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central St. Tammany, eastern Washington Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and western Pearl River Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 201 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Enon, or 8 miles southwest of Bogalusa, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bogalusa and Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
